inclusion.criterion: episodic migraine with 4-14 days of migraine per month
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The attacks come 2 times or more per week and each episode lasts around a day or a half.

inclusion.criterion: possess a smartphone - Android version 5.0 and above or iOS version 10.0 and above
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: unable to sign the consent form
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: headaches that do not meet the IHS migraine criteria or don't have moderate to severe chronic pain of VAS chronic grade 4 and above
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 15 year old girl with recurrent bilateral headache, diagnosed with migraine headache and under treatment.
